headline: Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. Announces Proposed Public Offering of Common Stock
summary: NEW YORK, May 20, 2025--Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. (NASDAQ: TTWO) (the "Company" or "Take-Two") today announced a proposed underwritten public offering of $1 billion of shares of its common stock. All shares to be sold in the offering are to be sold by the Company. In addition, the Company expects to grant the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase up to an additional $150 million of shares of its common stock. Take-Two intends to use the net proceeds for general corporate purposes, w

headline: The Best Stocks to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: MercadoLibre is an international e-commerce powerhouse that looks even more compelling as investors worry about U.S. tariffs.  Take-Two Interactive recently postponed the release of its most important new video game in years, but the stock still looks like a smart buy.  The stock market has been highly volatile in 2025, and it's impossible to predict what twists and turns will shape the market in the near term.
